text: we already have a giant, free fusion reactor in the sky called the sun. just catch it’s energy with pv, store in battery & you’re pretty much done.
author: elonmusk

text: fsd beta 10.2 rolls out friday midnight to ~1000 owners with perfect 100/100 safety scores. rollouts will hold for several days after that to see how it goes. if that looks good, beta will gradually begin rolling out to 99 scores & below.
author: elonmusk

text: a few last minute concerns about this build. release likely on sunday or monday. sorry for the delay.
author: elonmusk

text: beta 10.2 now rolling out to cars with 100/100 safety score over 100 miles
author: elonmusk

text: beta 10.3 releasing friday next week to all cars with 99/100 safety score
author: elonmusk

text: low occlusion gates are challenging, but should be fixed soon
author: elonmusk

text: should be nationwide rollout by end of month. note, still limited by peak number of users in same area. this will improve as more satellites are launched.
author: elonmusk

text: definitely further refinements coming to (early beta) safety test score. it will be refined continuously until it is an extremely good predictor of crash probability. exciting actuarial problem!
author: elonmusk

text: long list of mostly little items, but driving experience is significantly better. we will put notable changes in the release notes.
author: elonmusk

text: everyone with a perfect score with get it. there are ~1000 owners with perfect scores. maybe 1100 to 1200 by friday night.
author: elonmusk

text: note, quality of experience can vary dramatically, as our neural nets have far more training data in some parts of the country than others, but this should improve rapidly with more driving in those regions.
author: elonmusk

text: if it possible to start an ev company without shipping any cars & get a valuation less than a billion dollars!?
author: elonmusk

text: i hope they have a high pain tolerance. scaling production, supply chain, logistics & service is a world of hurt.
author: elonmusk

text: yes, we are talking to airlines about installing starlink. please let them know if you want it on your airliner. low latency ~half gigabit connectivity in the air!
author: elonmusk

text: death note, evangelion, ghost in the shell, spirited away, princess mononoke, full metal alchemist, your name
author: elonmusk

text: maybe next week. we’d like to get to 10.3 before expanding the beta.
author: elonmusk

text: agreed. trying to get all the approvals needed to offer insurance is extremely difficult, but it’s coming.
author: elonmusk

text: but they should go electric now. less range, but so easy, quiet & clean.
author: elonmusk

text: beenz, beenz the musical fruit the more you eat the more you toot
author: elonmusk

text: all the stairwells currently shown as wood-clad will actually have graffiti
author: elonmusk

text: vision became so good that radar actually reduced snr, so radar was turned off. humans drive with eyes & biological neural nets, so makes sense that cameras & silicon neural nets are only way to achieve generalized solution to self-driving.
author: elonmusk

text: just want to emphasize this is the work of hundreds of awesome engineers in both software & hardware, over 1000 data analysts & billions of owner miles
author: elonmusk

text: [puff, puff] what if the cure for cancer [puff, puff] was in the leaf ??
author: elonmusk

text: i love alw! couldn’t agree more. my dog marvin is havanese too, although i’m *his* emotional support human.
author: elonmusk

text: team is in fact working hard! they just confirmed 10.2 is good to go tomorrow night.
author: elonmusk

text: these are nice, but high time we built a really big tesla coil!
author: elonmusk

text: cells & fsd are massive, the rest is just beauty & romance … but life is empty without those last two
author: elonmusk

text: yeah, headlights are precision led, so they can be bright without blinding oncoming traffic, pedestrians & cyclists
author: elonmusk

text: it will hopefully achieve sustained cycle time of 45 seconds. at 75% uptime over an average week, that’s ~10k/week if run 24/7.
author: elonmusk

text: there are many small joys as you explore the car & more to come via software updates
author: elonmusk

text: sorry if we’ve been too dumb to respond to you. please cite evidence of exceptional ability in a few bullet points. nothing else matters.
author: elonmusk

text: if you’d like to join tesla ai, but can’t easily move to palo alto or austin, that is acceptable for extremely excellent candidates where inefficiency of distance is overcome by talent
author: elonmusk

text: i’m so dying to do a supersonic, electric votl jet, but adding more work will make my
author: elonmusk

text: starlink is designed for low to medium population density, which means we can hit max users in some areas fast. please sign up early to ensure a spot. as more satellites roll out, spacex will be able to serve more.
author: elonmusk

text: it’s a big deal that dragon is reusable, with improved refurbishment efficiency with each passing flight! this is not the case for other orbital spacecraft. it means the spacefleet grows every time a new dragon is made.
author: elonmusk

text: this was *extremely* difficult. huge props to tesla engineering, supply chain, production & key suppliers.
author: elonmusk

text: tough choice – so many great movies –but spaceballs for me
author: elonmusk

text: i wish i had had the opportunity to talk to him
author: elonmusk

text: and thanks very much to our suppliers & logistics partners for coming through despite great difficulties!
author: elonmusk

text: with & powerwall battery you are your own utility. 24/7 clean, sustainable electricity.
author: elonmusk
